body_html:
According to

I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:839] Creating TensorFlow device (/gpu:0) -> (device: 0, name: Quadro K4200, pci bus id: 0000:03:00.0)
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:839] Creating TensorFlow device (/gpu:1) -> (device: 1, name: Quadro K4200, pci bus id: 0000:04:00.0)

it now seems to work correctly. Thanks!

body:
According to 

I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:839] Creating TensorFlow device (/gpu:0) -> (device: 0, name: Quadro K4200, pci bus id: 0000:03:00.0)
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:839] Creating TensorFlow device (/gpu:1) -> (device: 1, name: Quadro K4200, pci bus id: 0000:04:00.0)

it now seems to work correctly. Thanks!
